alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 13 at 5:52AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...North to northwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts 55 to 60 MPH expected. * WHERE...Laramie County including the cities of Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Friday. The strongest winds are expected later this evening into early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
